titlepage.p: 2009 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Compact disk version of memoirs, and photographs, relating to Polish military operations during World War II, and to Polish migraffairs.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to sound recordings, video recordings, or motion picture material requires at least two weeks advance notice. Please contact the Hoover Institution Archives for further information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], , [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2003.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Polish army officer; subsequently migrin Argentina.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Compact disk version of memoirs, and photographs, relating to Polish military operations during World War II, and to Polish migraffairs.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: World War, 1939-1945 Poland.
Poles Argentina.
